probability

Class NormalDistributionCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • probability.NormalDistributionCalculator

  • public class NormalDistributionCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calculates Gaussian probability density and cumulative distribution functions.

        public static double phi(double x)

        Parameters:
        x - Double value
        mean - Mean value.
        sigma - Standard deviation.
        Returns:

      • PhiCumulative

        public static double PhiCumulative(double x)
        Zelen & Severo (1964) - method for approximating the cumulative distribution function
        Parameters:
        x - Double value.
        Returns:
        Cumulative distribution function for the normal distribution, upper bounded by the passed value x.
